channel.title: Process on Kamil Pro
channel.description: Recent content in Process on Kamil Pro

item.title: The automation process stages
item.description: This will be a high level experience I’ve been gaining whenever automating manual processes. What does it mean to automate? Simply put, is to remove a person from equation in order to complete the task. It can go as far as automating the whole process, or just part of it. The main goal here is to release the resource – that is a person’s time and energy – and redirect it toward something more valuable.
